page.title: 01SUMMARY OF AREA
page.content: The area we are studying is based around Tattingstone. It is mainly an agricultural region about 6 miles from the main population centre of Ipswich. It has a scattered population of isolated farms and its main nucleus is the tiny village of Tattingstone which dates back to Saxon times and probably beyond.The church ,the school the hospital and the shop and post office are found here.It has a fairly stable population who are proud of their roots.It is an area in which one needs a car as the buses are few and far between and it is necessary for most people to leave the village to go to work or to shop. An important landowner in the area is the Paul family who own Bluegate Farm and Holbrook Park a private mixed woodland.
